annotation.spannedText: Children with chickenpox are advised not to attend early childhood services, school or public places for at least one week from the appearance of the rash until all the blisters are dry and crusted

classMention.mentionClass: Children with chickenpox are advised not to attend early childhood services, school or public places for at least one week from the appearance of the rash until all the blisters are dry and crusted

annotation.spannedText: Adults are advised not to attend work or public places for the same period of time

classMention.mentionClass: Adults are advised not to attend work or public places for the same period of time

annotation.spannedText: High risk contacts should also be excluded from early childhood services and school during the duration of an outbreak

classMention.mentionClass: High risk contacts should also be excluded from early childhood services and school during the duration of an outbreak

annotation.spannedText: a single dose after exposure in this age group may not prevent or reduce the severity of disease

classMention.mentionClass: a single dose after exposure in this age group may not prevent or reduce the severity of disease

annotation.spannedText: Receiving the vaccine after exposure to the disease will not make the disease more severe at any age

classMention.mentionClass: Receiving the vaccine after exposure to the disease will not make the disease more severe at any age

annotation.spannedText: Pregnant women with no reliable history of chickenpox should have an urgent blood test to check for immunity after exposure to chickenpox

classMention.mentionClass: Pregnant women with no reliable history of chickenpox should have an urgent blood test to check for immunity after exposure to chickenpox

annotation.spannedText: All new born newborn infants exposed to chickenpox around the time of delivery, hospitalised infants born before 28 weeks of pregnancy or with a birth weight less than 1000 grams, and children and adults with weakened immune systems and no reliable history of chickenpox should receive zoster immunoglobulin

classMention.mentionClass: All new born newborn infants exposed to chickenpox around the time of delivery, hospitalised infants born before 28 weeks of pregnancy or with a birth weight less than 1000 grams, and children and adults with weakened immune systems and no reliable history of chickenpox should receive zoster immunoglobulin

annotation.spannedText: For healthy adolescents and adults, the use of antiviral medicine should be considered in addition to comfort measures

classMention.mentionClass: For healthy adolescents and adults, the use of antiviral medicine should be considered in addition to comfort measures

annotation.spannedText: Drink plenty of water

classMention.mentionClass: Drink plenty of water

annotation.spannedText: Trim nails short and consider using mittens or clean socks, to decrease the risk of scratching, especially overnight

classMention.mentionClass: Trim nails short and consider using mittens or clean socks, to decrease the risk of scratching, especially overnight

annotation.spannedText: Have a cool or lukewarm bath every 3-4 hours

classMention.mentionClass: Have a cool or lukewarm bath every 3-4 hours

annotation.spannedText: Do not use soap

classMention.mentionClass: Do not use soap

annotation.spannedText: Try adding oatmeal, baking soda or moisturising bath lotion to the bath water

classMention.mentionClass: Try adding oatmeal, baking soda or moisturising bath lotion to the bath water

annotation.spannedText: Pat dry, do not rub, after bathing

classMention.mentionClass: Pat dry, do not rub, after bathing

annotation.spannedText: Moisturise with non-irritating skin lotion

classMention.mentionClass: Moisturise with non-irritating skin lotion

annotation.spannedText: Calamine lotion is not recommended

classMention.mentionClass: Calamine lotion is not recommended

annotation.spannedText: Dress in loose fitting clothing and change the bed linen daily

classMention.mentionClass: Dress in loose fitting clothing and change the bed linen daily

annotation.spannedText: When blisters in the mouth and throat affect drinking and eating, offer clear cool drinks and soft bland foods and avoid acidic drinks such as fruit juices

classMention.mentionClass: When blisters in the mouth and throat affect drinking and eating, offer clear cool drinks and soft bland foods and avoid acidic drinks such as fruit juices

annotation.spannedText: Use paracetamol to relieve discomfort and pain

classMention.mentionClass: Use paracetamol to relieve discomfort and pain

annotation.spannedText: If itching is severe, ask your doctor about anti-itching medicine in liquid or tablet form

classMention.mentionClass: If itching is severe, ask your doctor about anti-itching medicine in liquid or tablet form

annotation.spannedText: Aspirin or any medicine with an ingredient name including the words ‘salicylate’ or ‘salicytic acid’ MUST NOT be given to children with chickenpox because of the risk Reye’s Syndrome

classMention.mentionClass: Aspirin or any medicine with an ingredient name including the words ‘salicylate’ or ‘salicytic acid’ MUST NOT be given to children with chickenpox because of the risk Reye’s Syndrome

annotation.spannedText: The vaccine may prevent or reduce the severity of chickenpox disease if it is given within 3-5 days of exposure to someone with the disease.

classMention.mentionClass: The vaccine may prevent or reduce the severity of chickenpox disease if it is given within 3-5 days of exposure to someone with the disease.
